nodes.text: Cousins of Beck Ollet, a human male living on Lothal, existed during the same time that Ollet himself was a teenager. At one point, when Zare Leonis was looking for Ollet, his parents told him that he was spending a month riding jumpspeeders around Lothal with these cousins. This was actually cover for the fact that Ollet had joined an underground resistance against the Galactic Empire's activities on Lothal.
